item.description:
SOCIAL DANCE

Featuring "DJ PAUL"

Saturday, Dec. 5th, 2009
7:30 PM - Midnight

at Maironis Park
52 S. Quinsigamond Avenue, Shrewsbury, MA 01545

Enjoy hits from the 70's till today's popular titles

So what are you waiting for?

Get your dancing shoes on, come on out and
let's groove tonight!

Friendly people in a comfortable atmosphere from Central New England.

Contact: Ozzie Tuiskula 774-262-0075 DanceWorcester@aol.com

Visit: www.DanceWorcester.net

Details:

Admission $10.00 Dancers of all ages are welcome

Coffee & snacks will be provided Cash bar available

The December 5th dance, we will have marines collecting for Toy's for Tots. We would appreciate unwrapped gift for ages newborn to 13 years. Gift certificates for teenagers.

Thanking you in advance.

Other upcoming dances:

Dec. 19th Saturday 7:30PM to 12:00AM

Auburn Elks
754 Southbridge St. Auburn, Mass.

DJ Paul
item.name: Social Dance
